text: Anante Dilaila'a anage huno Samsonina asmi'ne, Kagra renevatga hanke'na nagazegu hue, hagi menina tamage hunka nasamio, higeno Samsoni'a huno, Kagra 7ni'a za'za nazokama erinka strini nofi'ma nezagi'za masinifi rusi nehunka nilima erinka ahentrakoma hanankeno, hanaveni'a omnena, amne vahekna hu'na manigahue.
